subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: For the next six weeks, Saratoga Race Course will become a summer Horse Haven, where many horsemen and horseplayers from around the country will look for the emergence of genuine equine stars.
snippet: For the next six weeks, Saratoga Race Course will become a summer Horse Haven, where many horsemen and horseplayers from around the country will look for the emergence of genuine equine stars.
